All other forums are not accepted!Rewards for Cryptotalk: Â Brand New - Jr. Member: Â 0.2 stakes per weekMember: Â 0.5 stakes per weekFull Member: 1 stakes per weekSr. Member: 1.5 stakes per weekHero Member: 2.5 stakes per weekLegendary: 3 stakes per weekVIP: 3.5 stakes per weekRewards for Bitcointalk: Â Copper Member - Jr. Member: not accepted!Member: 1 stake per weekFull Member: 1.5 stakes per weekSenior Member: 2 stakes per weekHero Member: 3 stakes per weekLegendary: 3.5 stakes per weekRules: Â 1. Find signature and avatar:- for Bitcointalk: Signatures and avatar. You must set avatar if your Bitcointalk rank is Full Member or higher and can't change avatar during campaign. - for Cryptotalk: Signature and Avatar (suitable for all ranks! so you must wear both) IMPORTANT! make sure that you add link https://youengine.io/ to your Cryptotalk signature! Know how. 2. You need to make at least 5 constructive posts each week. Minimum symbols in one post: 75 3. Multiple signatures are not allowed. But one Bitcointalk user is allowed to register (in google form) his one additional account on Cryptotalk.4. Spammers and multi-accounts will be banned and disqualified.5. Users with negative trust are not accepted. Receiving negative trust or ban during your participation in our campaign will result in you being disqualified from our campaign receiving nothing.6. You must wear a signature until the end of the campaign.7. You can post on Cryptotalk on any boards.8.
